title: If you hate Singed tell me why.
body: I need to know what people hate so i can become the hate.

replies.body: For some reason when he is on enemy team he is like the god. But when he is in my team he goes 0/10 and everyone one shots him lol

mix mix swirl. mix mix swirl... MIX MIX SWIRL.... 
#MIX MIX SWIRLLLLLLLLL!!!!!

I hate looking at his bald head..............now go shave your head

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
He's a determent to have on any team.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkdemon653,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ErlPs55V,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-12-31T20:36:41.607+0000)
>
> He's a determent to have on any team.

You know when you're playing singed just right when both your team AND the other team hates you.
He should have been reworked before Voli or Fidds

I can understand hating some singed players and hating how "BM"-y singed was designed to be, but really, he's super punishable in laning phase and very easy to destroy. But hashinshin said NERFED SINGED a few thousand times so people think he's overpowered.

singed has many things about him that are almost made out to be a troll.
he laughed when he flings you.
his recall is his stupid dance anmation.
as alrdy mentioned, when he is on the enemy team he goes full ap yet never dies. when he is on your team he goes tank yet everyone 1shots him.
one of the few champs who does this weird strat of "hey i die all the time but its actually a legit strategie"

> [{quoted}](name=Disco Swiss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ErlPs55V,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-31T17:06:11.864+0000)
>
> I need to know what people hate so i can become the hate.

when he flips you and laughs about it. 
worst vibe in the game. 
then spams laugh on your corpse and starts recalling with that stupid dance animation.
